title: Ep 400 | Phil Gives Some Important Christmas Advice & Jase’s Problem with Christmas Lights
description:
Jase recalls the one time Missy told him to put Christmas lights on the house and the hilarity that ensued. Phil gives some fatherly advice and describes his new, but confusing washing machine. Al has an apt analogy to describe how Phil sees technology. Jase learns that he did not know how to properly wash his clothes. Zach breaks down the different types of truth in the world. Jase explains why he is against the modern belief in one hour per week of worship. And Zach clarifies why churches should not use emotions to manipulate their congregations.
